contents.text: Thank you for calling Khan Academy South Bay, where learning is always free and accessible to everyone.
To explore our course offerings, press 1.
To browse math courses and resources, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our math education specialist.

navigationGoals: Identify which math course best fits my current skill level for professional development.
I want help strengthening my algebra skills to prepare for college math courses.
Discuss optimizing my personalized math curriculum using Khan Academy’s data-driven proficiency metrics.
I’d like guidance on finding a beginner math course suited for me.
I want to review the calculus and linear algebra modules for my physics studies.

contents.text: To browse science, arts, and humanities resources, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our science and humanities education specialist.

navigationGoals: Locate a concise science module to refresh my basic chemistry understanding.
I’m looking for science and humanities courses, like biology and writing, to retrain for a civilian career.
Inquire about integrating interactive science simulations into a homeschool AP Physics module.
I’m interested in exploring your science and arts classes.
I'm looking to explore physics and astronomy lessons on classical mechanics.

contents.text: For account support and partnership information, press 2.
For help with your Khan Academy account, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to the account support team.

navigationGoals: Reset my Khan Academy account password so I can regain access to my profile.
I need help resetting my account password so I can access my saved lessons.
Recover my student account, enable two-factor authentication, and troubleshoot login token errors.
I need help resetting my Khan Academy account password.
I need to reset my Khan Academy account password.

contents.text: For volunteer opportunities or partnerships, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our community outreach coordinator.

navigationGoals: Learn how to volunteer as a STEM mentor with Khan Academy South Bay.
I’m interested in volunteering as a STEM tutor through Khan Academy’s program.
Explore volunteering to develop open-source educational content or community-driven courseware.
I want information on how to volunteer as a tutor.
I want to sign up as a volunteer physics tutor with Khan Academy.
